title: What are your thoughts on European universities for international students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Europe has great schools, but it depends on where you want to study and what you want to study. Each country publishes their own rankings across their media. The most objective overall rankings in my opinion is the FT. They try to take a global overview and provide you the stats to help you choose.
I studies my masters in UK and I found that the education was more industrially oriented and the degrees frm UK, Germany, France etc. are well regarded by the employers allover the world.e
